title: 求助！1.7.2-Forge打不开！
author: altair22592
txt_content:
下载了整合包 1.7.2-Forge10.12.2.1147

用忘却的旋律的启动器启动后就没有反应了
启动器自动关闭，游戏窗口却没有弹出。
一开始以为是MOD冲突，但是全删了也没用。
之后就开了调试模式启动游戏
于是就得到了以下的进程码：


[23:37:20] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[23:37:20] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[23:37:20] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[23:37:20] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.2.217.1147 for Minecraft 1.7.2 loading
[23:37:20] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_25, running on Windows 8:amd64:6.2, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_25
[23:37:20] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod invtweaks.forge.asm.FMLPlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
[23:37:20] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[23:37:20] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[23:37:20] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[23:37:20] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_25]
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.remove(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_25]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:117) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]


现在有些急啊

replies.author: 叁只番茄
replies.txt_content:
1.7.2的forge对java8兼容性不太好
导致根本无法启动
有2个办法可以解决 你随便选择其中一个吧

1.安装java7

2.打一个补丁
先下载 http://www.fybertech.net/minecra ... oreModManager.class
.minecraft\libraries\net\minecraftforge\minecraftforge\你的forge版本   用解压缩软件里面的jar文件
按delete键删除META-INF文件夹
然后在jar里进入到cpw\mods\fml\relauncher\
把CoreModManager.class扔进去替换掉

这样就行了

replies.author: sur_2333
replies.txt_content: 可能是显卡驱动版本太低
